Disease.content:
Please identify the "Disease" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: Among the seven contributing centers , the proportion of patients for whom the observed phenotype did not match the predicted phenotype was 4 % - 23 % ( P < . 0001 ) , suggesting that differences in methods used for mutation detection or phenotype classification may account for a considerable proportion of genotype - phenotype inconsistencies .

3. Identify the entities that are related to disease: Based on the key words identified in step 2, the "Disease" entities in the paragraph are:
